title: The Mysterious tadpole
brief_description: A birthday gift from Uncle McAllister turns out to be more than Louis and his parents can handle. What appeared to be a tadpole has turned out to be much, much more! Louis’s love for his pet, and his determination to keep him, makes this film heartwarming and fun!
